title: Brooklyn Nets Fire Coach Steve Nash
description: The Nets have struggled to a 2-5 start, and their star guard Kyrie Irving is under fire for promoting an antisemitic documentary.
dc:creator: Sopan Deb and Scott Cacciola
media:description: The Nets and Coach Steve Nash parted ways on Tuesday. Over a little more than two seasons, Nash led the Nets to a 94-67 record.
